node.primary_description_zh: 本區所有候選人早前達成「約束力初選」共識，將由選民選出8位初選候選人中得票最高的6位參加官方選舉，落選的候選人將不會參加官方選舉，民主派以4席為目標。
node.primary_description_en: Pro-democracy camp is aiming for 4 seats in the official election and will send out 6 lists from the primaries. The results of the primaries is binding, any participant other than the top 6 vote-getterswill concede from the actual LegCo 2020 election.

node.primary_description_zh: 本區所有候選人早前達成「約束力初選」共識，將由選民選出12位初選候選人中得票最高的7位參加官方選舉，落選的候選人將不會參加官方選舉，民主派以5席為目標。
node.primary_description_en: The pro-democracy camp is aiming for 5 seats in the official election and will send out 7 lists from the primaries. The results of the primaries is binding, any participant other than the top 7 vote-getters will concede from the actual LegCo 2020 election.

node.primary_description_zh: 本區所有候選人早前達成「初選加棄選」雙軌制共識，民主派以4席為目標，共9隊出戰初選，尚未決定初選出線名額及正式選舉名額。
node.primary_description_en: The pro-democracy camp is aiming for 4 seats in the official election.The results of the primaries is binding, meaning that any participant other than the top vote-getters will concede. Before the election in September, a polling will be conducted (HKPORI) and the least supported candidate(s) (number to be determined) will also concede.

node.primary_description_zh: 本區所有候選人早前達成「初選加棄選」雙軌制共識，民主派以3席為目標，共6隊出戰初選，初選出線名額位5(初選票數最低的候選人退選)，選舉前夕，香港民意研究所將會舉行民調，而排名最後兩位的候選人需棄選。
node.primary_description_en: The pro-democracy camp is aiming for 3 seats in the official election and will send out 5 lists from the primaries. The results of the primaries is binding, meaning that any participant other than the top 5 vote-getters will concede.Before the election in September, a polling will be conducted (HKPORI) and the least supported 2 candidates will also concede.

node.primary_rule_zh: 不具約束力初選加棄選
node.primary_description_zh: 本區候選人並沒有達成「約束力初選」共識，民主派以4席為目標，選舉前夕，民調排名較低的候選人需棄選。
node.primary_description_en: The pro-democracy camp is aiming for 4 seats in the official election and the primaries is non-binding, meaning that given whatever results, candidates can still continue to campaign for the actual election. However, before the actual election in September, a polling will be conducted by the HK PORI (Hong Kong Public Opinion Research Institute) and the least supported candidate(s) will concede from the actual election.

node.primary_description_zh: 本區所有候選人早前達成「約束力初選」共識，參選四人立場請參考《立場新聞》專訪。
node.primary_description_en: The results of the primaries is binding, meaning that any participant other than the top vote-getter will concede from the official election. This year, there are a total of 4 lists from the pro-democratic camp running for the councillor seat.

constituency.primary_description_zh: 本區所有候選人早前達成「約束力初選」共識，參選四人立場請參考《立場新聞》專訪。
constituency.primary_description_en: The results of the primaries is binding, meaning that any participant other than the top vote-getter will concede from the official election. This year, there are a total of 4 lists from the pro-democratic camp running for the councillor seat.

stations.address_zh: 香港薄扶林香港大學學生會大樓地下
彌敦道229號周生生大廈503室
